title: 300 Pick-Up Lines to Woo Any Woman
description: Pick-Up Lines are great for every person in every situation! They can be used by men OR women to interact with the opposite sex. They can be used as a fun ice breaker to start up conversations. They can be used as an exciting game to get a group of friends to go out together. They can be used when you want to approach someone you're interested in, but you just can't think of anything else to say. This book contains 300 pick-up lines that have been tested, tried, and guaranteed to work! Use them, share them, or just read them to yourself. These will put a smile on anyone's face!
author: Daniel Willey
